extendedInfo.description: Right Wing News offers the best in conservative news and media. Read up on the battle between RIGHT and wrong (left). With the upcoming elections, Right Wing News offers insight into your favorite Republican and Libertarian candidates.Keywords: Republican,News, Politics, Political News, Conservative, Right Wing, Anti Obama,

reviews.title: Bare bones.
reviews.comment: NO ability to customize or subscribe to feeds. You get far more with three Drudge Report. Not recommended. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New ads suck!
reviews.comment: Will uninstall if this is not fixed soon
reviews.author: Drake Stanifer

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: It is refreshing to see this app, thank you!!  I would love to see a share feature so I could post your news feed on my FB page.
reviews.author: A Google User
